{{DISPLAYTITLE:Polyobj_OR_RotateRight}} {{Special|91|po, speed, angle|Polyobject|RotateRight, OR}}
Rotates a polyobject right through the specified angle. If ''angle'' is 255, then the polyobject will rotate continuously and never stop.
* ''po'': polyobj to rotate * ''speed'': how quickly the polyobj should rotate * ''angle'': [[Definitions#Byte_Angles|byte angle]] to rotate the polyobj through
The “OR” in this special stands for OverRide. Under normal circumstances, if a [[polyobject]] is doing something, you cannot make it do something else until it has finished whatever it is doing. This can be a problem with perpetual polyobjects (such as [[Polyobj_RotateLeft]] or [[Polyobj_RotateRight|Right]] with a [[Definitions#Byte_Angles|byte angle]] of 255). Using one of these four specials, you can force the polyobj to stop whatever it is doing and do something else.
